profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

The session was a deep dive into the critical role trust plays in the adoption and management of#digitalassets. We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,103 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

The spotlight on stablecoins is brighter than ever, especially considering their expanding use cases, from streamlining payroll, payments, to banking the unbanked. First Digitalreposted this CEO at First Digital Trust AtFirst Digital, we are keeping a close eye on the banking and#paymentsinfrastructure in Singapore so that we can better serve our clients.

We are currently in the process of applying for a payments license from the MAS in Singapore so that we can provide a full suite of services that complement our existing core#custodybusiness. We recognise that Singapore's banking#infrastructureis sophisticated and we want to be able to leverage that to solve some of the pain points our existing and potential clients are facing.

I truly believe that#Asiais primed for real growth and maturation of the industry. Hong Kong and Singapore are well positioned to capitalise on a huge opportunity to become the top Fintech/crypto hubs globally. Both cities have robust financial infrastructures, no capital controls and good public private partnership and these elements will help the#digitalassetmarket thrive.

Thanks toClaire Huangat theThe Straits Timesfor the feature. Read the full article here:https://lnkd.in/gXrzUmsZ

“We're living in... it's 2023, right? We're going into 2024. You can send a movie and you can stream a movie within seconds. You can send photos within seconds. We live in a world where information travels almost instantaneously. And yet, it still takes so long for value to transfer. That's why the traditional financial services industry is an industry that's – I don't want to say ripe for disruption – but ripe for evolution, because it really hasn't evolved."

CEO at First Digital Trust A dive into the custody, payments and tokenization trends that are top of mind for the digital assets industry, globally. 

Following the most recent#bearmarketcycle where we saw a lot of prominent players in crypto fall, there has been a concerted effort to bring greater clarity to#regulationin all jurisdictions. 

The role of#custodiansin the space have had to evolve with the industry as time has gone on. We now play a multi-faceted role as a facilitator or ally to both the traditional finance wold and firms operating in the crypto space, a bridge if you will. 

This whole trend of#tokenizationof real-world-assets will mature when people realise this can solve a lot of the problems facing traditional finance such as eliminating the middle man when earning yields on investments in traditional financial vehicles. 

Read the full article here: 👉https://lnkd.in/gNHiwvrJ#RWA#custody#crypto

Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.

overall_prompt_summary: The document is a security assessment report by Trail of Bits for Paxos, detailing findings and methodologies used. It includes contact information for the project managers and engineers involved. The most critical issues identified are related to access controls, with the supply controller being able to mint and burn tokens during a pause, and vulnerabilities in the initialization process of contracts. Additionally, there are concerns about the potential for Solidity compiler optimizations to cause undefined behavior. The report suggests that improvements could be made in the areas of access control mechanisms and initialization procedures to enhance security.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,129 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

In a riveting fireside chat with Raj Nandwani, Head of Global Business Development atBinance, we delved into the topic "Traditional Finance and the Intersection of the New Digital Assets Frontier."

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Our CEO Vincent Chok was hard at work over the weekend, guest lecturing at one ofHenri Arslanian's many classes at HKU. 

We are witnessing the evolution of education in the digital era. 💼💻 As we look ahead, we predict a significant shift in student courses, with a greater emphasis on#digitalassetsand#cryptocurrenciesin the future. 💡💰

🌐 The rapid growth and widespread adoption of digital assets have transformed the financial landscape. As a forward-thinking firm, we recognize the importance of equipping the next generation with the knowledge and skills necessary to navigate this dynamic environment. CEO at First Digital Trust Over the weekend, I had the privilege of guest lecturing in one ofHenri Arslanian's guest lectures at HKU, sharing insights on the evolving landscape of trust and digital assets custody. The session was a deep dive into the critical role trust plays in the adoption and management of#digitalassets. We explored the pioneering solutions making waves in the industry and discussed the challenges that lie ahead.
 
With digital assets becoming increasingly integral to our financial systems, the importance of secure and reliable custody solutions cannot be understated. It was inspiring to engage with a group of bright minds eager to push the boundaries of what's possible in#fintech.
 
A special thanks toHenri Arslanianfor the invitation and to the students for their thoughtful questions and engagement.#DigitalAssets#Custody#Blockchain#Innovation#Finance#Education

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,134 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,138 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

CEO at First Digital Trust A dive into the custody, payments and tokenization trends that are top of mind for the digital assets industry, globally. 

Following the most recent#bearmarketcycle where we saw a lot of prominent players in crypto fall, there has been a concerted effort to bring greater clarity to#regulationin all jurisdictions. 

The role of#custodiansin the space have had to evolve with the industry as time has gone on. We now play a multi-faceted role as a facilitator or ally to both the traditional finance wold and firms operating in the crypto space, a bridge if you will. 

This whole trend of#tokenizationof real-world-assets will mature when people realise this can solve a lot of the problems facing traditional finance such as eliminating the middle man when earning yields on investments in traditional financial vehicles.

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Our CEO Vincent Chok was hard at work over the weekend, guest lecturing at one ofHenri Arslanian's many classes at HKU. 

We are witnessing the evolution of education in the digital era. 💼💻 As we look ahead, we predict a significant shift in student courses, with a greater emphasis on#digitalassetsand#cryptocurrenciesin the future. 💡💰

🌐 The rapid growth and widespread adoption of digital assets have transformed the financial landscape. As a forward-thinking firm, we recognize the importance of equipping the next generation with the knowledge and skills necessary to navigate this dynamic environment. CEO at First Digital Trust Over the weekend, I had the privilege of guest lecturing in one ofHenri Arslanian's guest lectures at HKU, sharing insights on the evolving landscape of trust and digital assets custody. The session was a deep dive into the critical role trust plays in the adoption and management of#digitalassets. We explored the pioneering solutions making waves in the industry and discussed the challenges that lie ahead.
 
With digital assets becoming increasingly integral to our financial systems, the importance of secure and reliable custody solutions cannot be understated. It was inspiring to engage with a group of bright minds eager to push the boundaries of what's possible in#fintech.
 
A special thanks toHenri Arslanianfor the invitation and to the students for their thoughtful questions and engagement.#DigitalAssets#Custody#Blockchain#Innovation#Finance#Education

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,157 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,166 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

In a riveting fireside chat with Raj Nandwani, Head of Global Business Development atBinance, we delved into the topic "Traditional Finance and the Intersection of the New Digital Assets Frontier."

What a successful first day of riveting discussions lead by our very own Vincent Chok on a topic that is not going away anytime soon,#stablecoins.

It was great to see Vincent take the stage at such a prestigious conference and with high calibre industry insiders such as Lucy and Sinan, who both shared a lot of interesting insights around stable digital currencies 👏 CEO at First Digital Trust Engaging Week atBinanceBlockchain Week in Istanbul!

Day 1 set a high bar with a panel discussion on "Unlocking Value and Stablecoin Adoption in Asia," where I had the honor of sharing the stage with thought leaders in the industry. Moderated byBinance's Global Head of Sanctions, we engaged in deep discussions alongsideLucy Gazmararian, Founder & Managing Partner ofToken Bay Capital, andSinan Kocç, CEO ofBiLira.

Together, we discussed how#stablecoinscan co-exist with central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to power the financial infrastructure of Web 2.5 through to 3.0. The dialogue opened up perspectives on the power of consumer choice in the future of currency. 

The spotlight on stablecoins is brighter than ever, especially considering their expanding use cases, from streamlining payroll, payments, to banking the unbanked. It is also clear that the conversation around regulatory frameworks for stablecoins is just as crucial as their development and the need for a balanced approach that foster#innovationwhile ensuring security and#trustin the system.#FDUSD#BinanceBlockchainWeek#CBDC#FinancialInclusion#Regulation#Asia

“We're living in... it's 2023, right? We're going into 2024. You can send a movie and you can stream a movie within seconds. You can send photos within seconds. We live in a world where information travels almost instantaneously. And yet, it still takes so long for value to transfer. That's why the traditional financial services industry is an industry that's – I don't want to say ripe for disruption – but ripe for evolution, because it really hasn't evolved."

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

🌐 The rapid growth and widespread adoption of digital assets have transformed the financial landscape. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

CEO at First Digital Trust Over the weekend, I had the privilege of guest lecturing in one ofHenri Arslanian's guest lectures at HKU, sharing insights on the evolving landscape of trust and digital assets custody. We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,187 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

We recognise that Singapore's banking#infrastructureis sophisticated and we want to be able to leverage that to solve some of the pain points our existing and potential clients are facing.

I truly believe that#Asiais primed for real growth and maturation of the industry. Hong Kong and Singapore are well positioned to capitalise on a huge opportunity to become the top Fintech/crypto hubs globally. Both cities have robust financial infrastructures, no capital controls and good public private partnership and these elements will help the#digitalassetmarket thrive.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Day 1 set a high bar with a panel discussion on "Unlocking Value and Stablecoin Adoption in Asia," where I had the honor of sharing the stage with thought leaders in the industry. Moderated byBinance's Global Head of Sanctions, we engaged in deep discussions alongsideLucy Gazmararian, Founder & Managing Partner ofToken Bay Capital, andSinan Kocç, CEO ofBiLira.

Together, we discussed how#stablecoinscan co-exist with central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to power the financial infrastructure of Web 2.5 through to 3.0. The dialogue opened up perspectives on the power of consumer choice in the future of currency. 

The spotlight on stablecoins is brighter than ever, especially considering their expanding use cases, from streamlining payroll, payments, to banking the unbanked. It is also clear that the conversation around regulatory frameworks for stablecoins is just as crucial as their development and the need for a balanced approach that foster#innovationwhile ensuring security and#trustin the system.#FDUSD#BinanceBlockchainWeek#CBDC#FinancialInclusion#Regulation#Asia

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.

It includes a template for documenting necessary improvements after each dry run. The most critical issues identified are a race condition in the FraxGovernorOmega target validation and a vulnerable project dependency. To enhance security, the report suggests regular dry runs of response plans and updating the code to address the identified vulnerabilities.

profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,223 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

overall_prompt_summary: The document is a security assessment report by Trail of Bits for Frax Finance, detailing vulnerabilities and recommendations. It outlines the findings and suggests both short-term and long-term improvements. Key issues identified include susceptibility to transaction-reordering attacks and the ABIEncoderV2 not being ready for production. Additionally, the k-dss is out of sync with other repositories, and there are concerns with the auth-checker's incomplete use of checkRely. To enhance security, the report recommends regular dry runs of response plans and the creation of a template for documenting necessary improvements.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,227 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

What a successful first day of riveting discussions lead by our very own Vincent Chok on a topic that is not going away anytime soon,#stablecoins.

It was great to see Vincent take the stage at such a prestigious conference and with high calibre industry insiders such as Lucy and Sinan, who both shared a lot of interesting insights around stable digital currencies 👏 CEO at First Digital Trust Engaging Week atBinanceBlockchain Week in Istanbul!

Day 1 set a high bar with a panel discussion on "Unlocking Value and Stablecoin Adoption in Asia," where I had the honor of sharing the stage with thought leaders in the industry. Moderated byBinance's Global Head of Sanctions, we engaged in deep discussions alongsideLucy Gazmararian, Founder & Managing Partner ofToken Bay Capital, andSinan Kocç, CEO ofBiLira.

Together, we discussed how#stablecoinscan co-exist with central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to power the financial infrastructure of Web 2.5 through to 3.0. The dialogue opened up perspectives on the power of consumer choice in the future of currency. 

The spotlight on stablecoins is brighter than ever, especially considering their expanding use cases, from streamlining payroll, payments, to banking the unbanked. It is also clear that the conversation around regulatory frameworks for stablecoins is just as crucial as their development and the need for a balanced approach that foster#innovationwhile ensuring security and#trustin the system.#FDUSD#BinanceBlockchainWeek#CBDC#FinancialInclusion#Regulation#Asia

Both cities have robust financial infrastructures, no capital controls and good public private partnership and these elements will help the#digitalassetmarket thrive.

CEO at First Digital Trust A dive into the custody, payments and tokenization trends that are top of mind for the digital assets industry, globally. 

Following the most recent#bearmarketcycle where we saw a lot of prominent players in crypto fall, there has been a concerted effort to bring greater clarity to#regulationin all jurisdictions. 

The role of#custodiansin the space have had to evolve with the industry as time has gone on. We now play a multi-faceted role as a facilitator or ally to both the traditional finance wold and firms operating in the crypto space, a bridge if you will. 

This whole trend of#tokenizationof real-world-assets will mature when people realise this can solve a lot of the problems facing traditional finance such as eliminating the middle man when earning yields on investments in traditional financial vehicles. 

Read the full article here: 👉https://lnkd.in/gNHiwvrJ#RWA#custody#crypto

🔒 Seeking robust digital asset security for your company?

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

overall_prompt_summary: The document is a summary of a security assessment conducted by Trail of Bits on Frax Finance, identifying vulnerabilities and areas for improvement. It outlines the engagement goals, findings, and recommendations for both short-term and long-term strategies. Critical issues include susceptibility to transaction-reordering attacks and the ABIEncoderV2 not being production-ready, along with repository synchronization problems and incomplete permission checks. Additionally, the complexity of permission notions within the system is highlighted as a concern. To mitigate these issues, regular dry runs and a structured response plan are recommended to enhance system robustness and security.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.
